scripts.clean: shx rm -f main.js && shx rm -f main.js.map
scripts.release: yarn clean && parcel build --no-cache --no-source-maps --target target_main src/main.js
scripts.build: yarn clean && parcel build --no-cache --target target_main src/main.js
scripts.watch: yarn clean && parcel watch --no-cache --target target_main --no-hmr src/main.js
